product_name: Arc'teryx Epsilon LT Hoody Jacket - Men's
long_description: A boon for almost any outdoor activity, the men's Arc'teryx Epsilon LT Hoody Jacket combines the moderate mid-layer warmth of fleece with the durable woven face of a soft shell. Stretchy nylon/spandex face features a durable water repellent finish to shed light precipitation. Lightweight polyester fleece is bonded to the back for light warmth. Low-profile StormHood(TM) offers complete weather protection; 1-handed drawcords allow hood to rotate with the head without obscuring your vision. Arc'teryx Epsilon LT Hoody Jacket offers zippered hand pockets and a laminated sleeve pocket. Gusseted cuffs pull on/off easily over gloves; hem drawcord seals out drafts.
